None.Name: Blessed Sharing
None.Description: Installs a magical bond between up to 5 friendly units within a 25m radius. The affected units will then mutually share their life points with each other as long as they are positioned within a 25m radius towards one another. All incoming damage will be equally spread among all members relative to each units current life points. None of the members can die as long as the group still has more than one life point left. Additionally, affected units will take 25% less damage. Lasts for 15 seconds. Reusable every 20 seconds.
